Meetup 8 notes: UX and more jQuery

04 Sep 2013

We were all a bit tired, so we spent most of the meetup playing with jQuery again. It’s a strange beast with all the curly brackets and dollar signs, but we’re determined to tame it because we like the fun stuff it allows us to do. Like toggling a class on click (yes, that’s our very own jsFiddle we shared!).

We also had a super awesome introduction to UX by one the the Catz. Which got us into playing with HTML5 sliders in combination with jQuery.

On a somehow related noteâ€¦

Homework

Most of our web apps still need jQuery validation. Check out the example in kibble and follow along. Try to find some other cool things to learn and share with the Catz.

Side note: next week Celtra will be our temporary host instead of Zemanta. We love you both!
